tasks.label: Pip freeze
tasks.command: source ${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/activate; pip freeze > requirements.txt; echo Requirements updated

tasks.label: Django - Make migrations
tasks.command: export APP_ENV=DEV; pipenv run python mono/manage.py makemigrations

tasks.label: Django - Migrate
tasks.command: export APP_ENV=DEV; pipenv run python mono/manage.py migrate

tasks.label: Django - Run tests
tasks.command: export APP_ENV=TEST; cd mono; pipenv run python manage.py test --parallel 12 --failfast

tasks.label: Django - Coverage
tasks.command: export APP_ENV=TEST; cd mono; pipenv run coverage run --source='.' manage.py test -b --timing; pipenv run coverage html; firefox htmlcov/index.html;
